title: How to turn Google Home schedule notifications back on?
content:
Hello,
I accidentally turned off my notifications for Google Home schedules. I have tried going into "Apps and Notifications" and into the Google notifications section to find somewhere to turn them back on. I can't seem to find a way. Had anyone else had this issue and know how to turn them back on please?
Thanks for your time
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a
